Detailed Description

Static class that holds the GetChunkInfo set of functions.

Member Function Documentation

◆ GetChunkInfo() [1/2]

ChunkInfo IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkCrypto::GetChunkInfo ( array< System::Byte >^  mpbArrayBytes)
static

Determines if a chunk is Ionic protected and various pieces of information about the chunk.

Parameters
[in]mpbArrayBytesThe input buffer assumed to be a binary chunk.
Returns
Returns a ChunkInfo object that describes the chunk. If an error occurs while processing the chunk (for example, a chunk is recognized but corrupted), an SdkException will be thrown.

◆ GetChunkInfo() [2/2]

ChunkInfo IonicSecurity::SDK::ChunkCrypto::GetChunkInfo ( String ^  msDataChunk)
static

Determines if a data chunk is Ionic protected and various pieces of information about the chunk.

Parameters
[in]msDataChunkThe input data chunk.
Returns
Returns a ChunkInfo object that describes the chunk. If an error occurs while processing the chunk (for example, a chunk is recognized but corrupted), an SdkException will be thrown.
